document.full_text: left-wing nationalist ollanta humala has extended his lead in peru's presidential race and former prime minister pedro pablo kuczynski may now be in second place, polls showed on friday before the april 10 vote.
document.title: humala extends lead in peru presidential race
lines_and_colors: left-wing nationalist ollanta humala has extended his lead in peru's presidential race and former prime minister pedro pablo kuczynski may now be in second place, polls showed on friday before the april 10 vote.
